verses.text:
If
it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;

If
it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

Blessed
be the LORD, who hath not given us
as a prey to their teeth.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

Our help
is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.

text:
If
it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
If
it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
Blessed
be the LORD, who hath not given us
as a prey to their teeth.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
Our help
is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
